amendment.description: To amend the Federal Law Enforcement Pay Reform Act of 1990 to adjust the percentage differentials payable to Federal law enforcement officers in certain high-cost areas, and for other purposes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3310 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 3310 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To amend the Federal Law Enforcement Pay Reform Act of 1990 to adjust the percentage differentials payable to Federal law enforcement officers in certain high-cost areas, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3310 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Dodd.
